s.text: This particular list wasn't following a 12 step philosophy--it was something called Moderation Management; and one of the people who called the FBI was an AA advocate.
(Let's not forget the one in last week's horrific story, who injected his son with the AIDS virus to avoid paying child support.)
(Let's not forget the one in last week's horrific story, who injected his son with the AIDS virus to avoid paying child support.)
(Let's not forget the one in last week's horrific story, who injected his son with the AIDS virus to avoid paying child support.)
Unlike on the Net, people in 12 step groups often get to know each other outside--they go out for coffee, become friends (for a while AA was a big date scene, maybe it still is).
